card.name: A Daring Rescue
card.text: Creatures you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: After-Party Blues
card.text: When After-Party Blues enters the battlefield, create a Cursed Role token attached to each creature. (Enchanted creatures are 1/1.) {1}{U}{B}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Surveil 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Agnes, Wicked Witch
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever you sacrifice an artifact or creature, each opponent loses 1 life. {1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: You draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Aklanys, the Sunken City
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. {1}{U}, {T}: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Alix, Lost in the Forest
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Spellbind — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more enchantments, you may move all counters from target creature you control onto target land you control. If you do, that land becomes a 0/0 enchantment creature with haste. It's still a land.

card.name: All Hands on Deck
card.text: Choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Create a 2/2 red pirate creature token. • Create two rose tokens. (They're artifacts with "1, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. ")

card.text: Haste Amaryllis gets +2/+0 as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater. Channel — {2}{R}{G}, Discard Amaryllis: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.text: Flying When Amie enters the battlefield, create a Beguiled Land token. (It's a world enchantment with "Enchantment spells cost {1} less to cast.) You may cast enchantment spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Anchor Runner
card.text: Haste When Anchor Runner deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, gain control of target artifact with mana value 0 that player controls. Activated abilities of that artifact can't be activated while this ability is on the stack.

card.name: Aros, the Lone Musketeer
card.text: Haste Whenever Aros attacks alongside three or more other creatures, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Beachcombing for Treasure
card.text: When Beachcombing for Treasure enters the battlefield, exile the top three cards of your library. Raid — As long as you have attacked this turn, you may play cards exiled with Beachcombing for Treasure.

card.text: When Beauté enters the battlefield, create two rose tokens. Whenever you sacrifice a rose, Beauté gains haste and menace until end of turn. Channel — {B/R}, Discard Beauté: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Bite Down

card.name: Black Spot
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature is a Pirate, it's controller loses 3 life.

card.text: Target creature gains hexproof, indestructible, and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: The Thunderdell
card.text: Reach, Trample Plants you control have trample.

card.name: The Wild Rose Tree
card.text: When The Wild Rose Tree enters the battlefield, choose one — • Create two 1/1 blue bird creature tokens with flying. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. When a creature you control dies, create a Rose token. When a creature you don't control dies, you gain 1 life.

card.name: The Wise King of Favola
card.text: Other Humans you control get +1/+1. Non-Humans you control have outflank. Whenever a Human you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: The Witch of the Selkie
card.text: When The Witch of the Selkie enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts. The Witch of the Selkie has all activated abilities of cards exiled with it.

card.name: Therai, Royal Imposter
card.text: +1: Create a Rose token.
-1: Until end of turn, target artifact you control becomes a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste.
-7: Gain control of each creature you don't control until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste.

card.name: They Come in Threes
card.text: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell, copy it twice. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control that share a name with that creature.

card.name: Thorn Lance
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage to target creature or planeswalker you don't control equal to its power. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Thornwood Falls
card.text: Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped. When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Thornwood Tangle
card.text: When Thornwood Tangle enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {G}. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add {G}{G} instead.

card.name: Thorny Forest Guide
card.text: Reach Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, up to one target creature can't block this turn. Scry 1. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this time, draw a card.

card.name: Thorny Treefolk
card.text: When Thorny Treefolk enters the battlefield, it fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Three Bears
card.text: Create three 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.

card.name: Timothé Thomas
card.text: When Timothé Thomas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or enchantment card from among them and put it into your hand. Recycle the rest. Spellbind — As long as you control three or more enchantments, creatures you control have flying.

card.name: Tortuga Bay Turtle
card.text: Ward {1} {X}{U}: Tortuga Bay Turtle gets +X/-X until end of turn. This ability costs {1} less for each artifact you control.

card.name: Town Hero
card.text: Town Hero has first strike as long as it's your turn. Whenever a spell or ability targets Town Hero, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tranquil Cove
card.text: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Troll Bridge
card.text: Menace Whenever Troll Bridge attacks, defending player may have you create a treasure token. If they do, untap Troll Bridge and remove it from combat.

card.name: Tulano Deckhand
card.text: Raid - When Tulano Deckhand enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, scry 1 and create a Rose token. (It's an artifact with " {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.")

card.name: Tulano Hawk
card.text: Flying Whenever you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.

card.name: Tulano Pirate
card.text: Defiant (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, it also deals that much damage to a permanent that player controls or protects.)

card.name: Turned into Furniture
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature you don't control Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with " {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color." It loses all other abilities. Come Alive (When enchanted permanent goes to the graveyard from the battlefield, return this card to the battlefield transformed.)

card.name: Uldrin Ducasse
card.text: When Uldrin Ducasse enters the battlefield, you may search your hand, graveyard, and/or library for a card named Uldrin's Biography and put it onto the battlefield. If you searched your library, shuffle.
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
-1: Scry 2.

card.name: Uldrin's Biography
card.text: {T}: Choose a nonland card name. Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal any number of cards with the chosen name from among them and put them into your hand. Recycle the rest.

card.name: Unexpected Trial
card.text: (As this saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
1,2,3 — Put a suspect counter on target creature without a suspect counter on it. That creature can't block as long as it has a suspect counter on it.
4 — Exile this saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

card.name: Unlucky Faerie
card.text: Flying When Unlucky Faerie enters the battlefield, create a cursed role token attached to target creature you control.

card.name: Unsummon
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Unyielding Guardian
card.text: Whenever you cast a white creature spell, create a rose token. Roses you control have " {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains defiant until end of turn." (Whenever a defiant creature deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to a permanent they control or protect.)

card.name: Upelkuchen
card.text: Put five +1/+1 counters and a reach counter on target creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Vanishing Cat
card.text: {2}{U}: Vanishing Cat can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Very Angry Mob
card.text: Haste Very Angry Mob gets +1/+0 for each other creature named Very Angry Mob you control.

card.name: Visions of the Future
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Choose one of them. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Recycle the other exiled cards."

card.name: Wall of Leaves
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Wall of Thorns
card.text: Defender, Defiant Whenever Wall of Thorns is dealt damage by a source you don't control, create that many Rose tokens. Sacrifice three artifacts: Until end of turn, Wall of Thorns gets +6/+0 and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Wall of Timber
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

card.name: Wardrobe Butler
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Waters of Temptation
card.text: When Waters of Temptation enters the battlefield, create a High Seas token. Whenever Waters of Temptation deals damage to another creature, put a temptation counter on that creature and it becomes a treasure artifact with " {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color." (This effect lasts indefinitely.) {3}{R}: Waters of Temptation deals 1 damage to target creature. (=a7e0

card.name: What Lies in the Swamp
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, its controller loses that much life and you gain that much life. Come Alive (When enchanted creature dies, return this card to the battlefield transformed.)

card.name: When the Rose Tree Blossomed
card.text: When When the Rose Tree Blossomed enters the battlefield, up to two target creatures get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn. {2}{W}, Sacrifice When the Rose Tree Blossomed: Create two rose tokens. (They're artifacts with " {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.")

card.name: Where the Wind Guides Us
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Raid — If you attacked this turn, scry 1.

card.name: Wicked Witch
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1, then draw a card. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Wind-Scarred Crag
card.text: Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield tapped. When Wind-Scarred Crag enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Winged Guide
card.text: Flying (Tis creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)

card.name: Winged Words
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a creature with flying. Draw two cards.

card.name: Winter Wolf
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Winter Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Wish Upon a Star
card.text: Search your graveyard, hand, or library for a permanent card and put it on the battlefield. If you searched your library in this way, shuffle.

card.name: Witch's Curse
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of enchanted creature's controller's upkeep, its controller loses 2 life unless they sacrifice an artifact. Come Alive (When enchanted creature dies, return this aura to the battlefield transformed.)

card.name: Witchstalker Frenzy
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that attacked this turn. Witchstalker Frenzy deals 5 damage to target creature.

card.name: Withering Roots
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -4/-4. Come Alive (When enchanted creature dies, return this aura to the battlefield transformed.)

card.name: Wolf Bite
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn, then fights up to one target creature you don't control.

card.name: Wolf Pup
card.text: As long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Wolf Pup gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: Worshipping the Rose
card.text: When Worshipping the Rose enters the battlefield, create a Rose token, then exile target nonland permanent you don't control until Worshipping the Rose leaves the battlefield if the target has mana value X or less, where X is the number of Roses you control.

card.name: X Marks the Spot
card.text: When X Marks the Spot enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card you own in exile with a mark counter on it at random. Remove a mark counter from it and look at it. You may play that card this turn. Then exile the top card of your library face down with a mark counter on it.

card.name: Youthful Adventure
card.text: When Youthful Adventure enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, put it on the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. As long as you control an Island, whenever a creature you control with flying deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and draw a card.

card.name: Zephyr Gull
card.text: Flying
